description: Expert in robotics to fully automatize and connect our robots to the ERP production system.

duties.desc:
Experience and Skills

  • Minimum of 6 years experience in Kuka robots programming and commissioning.
  • Good Kuka robot knowledge, including KRC2 and KRC4 controllers operation as well as Kuka Robot language programming.
  • Good level of English.
  • Knowledge of Rust programming.
  • Optional: Knowledge of Java programming.

Software and Systems Knowledge Required

  • Powermill robot toolpath generation: advanced.
  • KRC 2/ KRC 4 Kuka controller knowledge: advanced.
  • KRL robot language advanced.
  • General CAD software knowledge.

Duties

  • Setup an automated composite parts production line including trimming and pick-and-place of fabric plies and hydraulic press.
  • Commission robots.
  • Program the robots.
  • Develop and add IOT (Raspberry Pi like) devices to control the robots and various devices in Rust.
  • Connect the IOT devices to the JAVA based online ERP system.

description: Be at the forefront of precision manufacturing as a CNC Operator.

duties.desc:
Mechanical Production Duties

  • Ensure that the CNC machines and machine room are clean, in proper state of operating at all times;
  • Operate all CNC machines;
  • Fabricate parts from Aluminum, steel and other exotic alloys;
  • Consign the actual fabrication times and stock weights in the appropriate log;
  • Verify parts tolerances and mechanical assembly clearances;
  • Verify general part surface quality;
  • Log machine hours and machine problems on the machine log;
  • Establish and follow up on interval maintenance programs;
  • Verify cutters stock, cutters condition.

Programming Duties

  • Read and analyze the CAD generated by the design engineer;
  • Assist the programmer in generating tool path;
  • Assist in noting machining times and stock weights in the appropriate system to generate cost sheets;
  • Verify versus actual times and stock weight and generate a warning in case of discrepancies.

description: Join our team as a Composite Technician, where you will play a crucial role in the manufacturing of ...

duties.desc:
Experience

  • 3 years experience in composites manufacturing process in wet lamination and/or pre-preg, including carbon fibre and fibreglass.
  • Working level of English.

Duties

  • Ensure that the work station and tools are clean, in proper state before starting the production.
  • Cut fabrics according to templates and prepare/organize for each specific job.
  • Prepare the molds before production. Wax according to best practices, set up on tables.
  • Paint with 2K enamels or gel-coats prior to laminating. Ensure thin spray for minimal weight.
  • Prepare resin according to the proper standards and specifications, and ensure the mix ratio is correct. Verify that the pot lifes are being respected and that no large quantity of resin is left unattended in the pots.
  • Prepare the vacuum process or infusion process (including dry fabric spray, tack-on according to specific patterns/drawings).
  • Wet laminate fabrics/sandwiches or lay down pre-pregs or process resin infusion (including infusion injector machine operation).
  • Transfer the parts to the ovens, verify temperatures and curing schedules.
  • Fabricate plugs from supplied CNC machined foam blocks.
  • Fabricate molds from supplied plugs.
  • Carve details in plugs according to drawing (part numbers, end of part lines, control lines and other details).

Quality Process Duties

  • Ensure that the production of part is efficient.
  • Follow the production timing required for each part and log timing follow up.
  • Consign the fabrication times and part weights in the appropriate table.
  • Verify parts tolerances and mechanical assembly clearances conform to requirements.
  • Verify general part surface quality.
  • Logging of problems with the molds or tooling.
  • Analyze log problems and trigger on condition maintenance if required.
  • Enter record of jobs in progress into the company Intranet progress report.
  • Enter quality records into the company Intranet quality page and/or progress report page.
  • Apply 5S principles, including but not limited to: keeping the room and tools clean at all times. Verifying that the tools and tables are back in their respective positions at the end of the day. Verifying that the fabric rolls and materials are stowed properly and in their respective location. Verifying cutters stock, cutters condition. Emptying the bins daily. Verifying that the floor is clean at the end of the day.

Production and Inventory Duties

  • Check raw material stock and tooling and consign inventory.
  • Issue low inventory alerts to the Composite Production Manager for raw material and tools.
  • Transfer parts produced to the stock room and advise the Composite Production Manager accordingly.
  • Reception of new stock, cutters and general tooling and transfer to stock rooms and production rooms.

Efficiency and Improvement Duties

  • Identify ways to improve production efficiency and advise the Composite Production Manager.
  • Identify the need for new tools to improve production efficiency and advise the Composite Production Manager.

description: Join our dynamic team as a Full-Stack Developer, where you'll play a pivotal role in creating end-to ...

duties.desc:
Full-Stack Developer Duties and Responsibilities

  • Design and implement scalable and robust software solutions for both front-end and back-end applications.
  • Collaborate with cross-functional teams to define, design, and ship new features.
  • Write clean, maintainable, and efficient code across the full software stack.
  • Develop and maintain databases, servers, and applications to ensure optimal performance.
  • Participate in code reviews, identify areas for improvement, and provide constructive feedback.
  • Stay up-to-date with industry trends and emerging technologies to ensure the continuous improvement of software development processes.
  • Troubleshoot, debug, and resolve issues in both development and production environments.
  • Implement security and data protection measures to safeguard software applications.
  • Collaborate with front-end developers to integrate user-facing elements with server-side logic.
  • Conduct regular system and software performance analyses and optimize as needed.

description: Become a Front-End Developer and translate design concepts into responsive, interactive websites.

duties.desc:
Front-End Developer Duties and Responsibilities

  • Collaborate with UI/UX designers and back-end developers to implement visually appealing and responsive user interfaces.
  • Write clean, efficient, and well-documented code for web applications.
  • Optimize web applications for maximum speed and scalability.
  • Ensure the technical feasibility of UI/UX designs and implement them accordingly.
  • Create and maintain front-end architecture, ensuring the feasibility of UI/UX designs and user interactions.
  • Identify and troubleshoot front-end performance issues and implement solutions.
  • Stay current on industry trends and emerging front-end technologies.
  • Collaborate with back-end developers to integrate user-facing elements with server-side logic.
  • Conduct thorough code reviews and provide constructive feedback to improve code quality.
  • Ensure cross-browser compatibility and optimize applications for various devices.
  • Implement and maintain testing processes to ensure a high-quality user experience.
